stories.title: Evaluate documentation
stories.instructions: FIRST read .claude/skills/write-docs/SKILL.md to understand the voice standards. Then score the document on readability, voice, completeness, and accuracy. Verify code examples against actual API.
acceptance: Scores written to frontmatter (readability, voice, completeness, accuracy)
Notes field populated with specific observations
Priority fixes identified if any score < 8

stories.title: Improve documentation
stories.instructions: FIRST read .claude/skills/write-docs/SKILL.md for voice guidelines. Address priority fixes from evaluation. Focus on lowest scores first. Eliminate AI writing tells.

stories.title: Update for code changes
stories.instructions: Sync documentation with recent API changes. Compare doc content to current codebase.
acceptance: All code snippets use current API

evaluate.description: Score a document on 4 dimensions and write findings to frontmatter

improve.description: Improve a document based on evaluation scores and notes

write.description: Create a new documentation article from scratch
write.workflow: Use /docs command pattern with thorough code research

update.description: Update existing doc to reflect recent code changes
update.workflow: Compare doc content against current codebase, update outdated sections

apply-style.description: Apply style guide updates across documents
apply-style.workflow: Check for voice guideline violations, update to current standards
